sentence.Network_en: Objective To construct a cDNA expression library of Periplaneta Americana nymph.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的　构建美洲大蠊若虫cDNA表达文库.

sentence.Network_en: Bioactivities of MiEM to cockroach ( Periplaneta Americana ) were assayed after mature peptide folding correctly.
sentence.Network_cn: 合成的线性肽经氧化折叠纯化后,用于测试其对环境害虫蟑螂 ( Periplanetaamericana ) 的抗虫活性.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To observe the effect of AB cockroach attractant on Periplaneta americana and Blattella germanica.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的观察AB型蟑螂引诱剂对美洲大蠊和德国小蠊的引诱效果.

PerfectNetExp.abs: CHARACTERISTIC ANALYSIS OF RESPIRATION SIGNAL IN PERIPLANETA AMERICANA美洲大蠊呼吸信号特征分析
periphyton 悬垂水生物, periplaneta 大蠊属, periphyton 水生附着生物
